metadata.title: Weekly Reflection

slides.title: Summary
lines: This week was filled with creativity and self-discovery, capturing moments of joy and pride.

slides.title: Highlights
lines: - I protected time for journaling and it helped my focus.
- I jotted notes about creative routines and want to revisit them soon.

scene_prompts: Flat pastel cartoon illustration, soft gradients, minimal shading, clean shapes, 2D, wide 16:9 composition, no text, no captions, no logos, no watermarks. Recurring character in every scene: friendly androgynous adult, short wavy hair, warm teal sweater, expressive eyes, calm smile. Keep character design consistent. Scene: The character reviews a weekly calendar on a desk, soft icons floating around (hearts, stars, speech bubbles). Date range: 2025-12-31 to 2026-01-07.
